ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Compute the position of the sun, and local solar time using Meeus' formulae. Compute day and/or night length using different twilight definitions or arbitrary sun elevation angles. This package is part of the 'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo, P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>. Algorithms from Meeus (1998, ISBN:0943396611).

Compute the position of the sun, and local solar time using Meeus' formulae. Compute day and/or night length using different twilight definitions or arbitrary sun elevation angles. This package is part of the 'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo, P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>. Algorithms from Meeus (1998, ISBN:0943396611).

name: r-suncalcmeeus
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.1.3" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-suncalcmeeus
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/SunCalcMeeus_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/SunCalcMeeus/SunCalcMeeus_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 2d9469b5e0390e3501892ff07a1f1c28ed08fbfeae986ffe77aba48c44fe99f1

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=1.1.4
    - r-lubridate >=1.9.4
    - r-tibble >=3.3.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-dplyr >=1.1.4
    - r-lubridate >=1.9.4
    - r-tibble >=3.3.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('SunCalcMeeus')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('SunCalcMeeus')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://docs.r4photobiology.info/SunCalcMeeus/, https://github.com/aphalo/SunCalcMeeus
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Compute the position of the sun, and local solar time using Meeus' formulae. Compute day and/or night length using different twilight definitions or arbitrary sun elevation angles. This package is part of the 'r4photobiology' suite, Aphalo, P. J. (2015) <doi:10.19232/uv4pb.2015.1.14>. Algorithms from Meeus (1998,
    ISBN:0943396611).
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
